verses.verse: Where<WG4159> do wars<WG4171> and<WG2532> fightings<WG3163> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> come from?<WG3756> Don't they come<WG1782> from<WG1537> your<WG5216> pleasures<WG2237> that war<WG4754> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> members?<WG3196>

You lust,<WG1937> and<WG2532> don't<WG3756> have.<WG2192> You kill,<WG5407> covet,<WG2206> and<WG2532> can't<WG1410> <WG3756> obtain.<WG2013> You fight<WG3164> and<WG2532> make war.<WG4170> <WG1161> You<WG5209> don't<WG3756> have,<WG2192> because<WG1223> you<WG5209> don't<WG3361> ask.<WG154>

You ask,<WG154> and<WG2532> don't<WG3756> receive,<WG2983> because<WG1360> you ask<WG154> with wrong motives,<WG2560> so that<WG2443> you may spend<WG1159> it for<WG1722> your<WG5216> pleasures.<WG2237>

You adulterers<WG3432> and<WG2532> adulteresses,<WG3428> don't<WG3756> you<WG1492> know that<WG3754> friendship<WG5373> with the world<WG2889> is<WG2076> enmity<WG2189> with God?<WG2316> Whoever<WG3739><WG99999> therefore<WG3767> wants<WG1014> to be<WG1511> a friend<WG5384> of the world<WG2889> makes<WG2525> himself an enemy<WG2190> of God.<WG2316>

Or do<WG2228> you think<WG1380> that<WG3754> the Scripture<WG1124> says<WG3004> in vain,<WG2761> "The Spirit<WG4151> who<WG3739> lives<WG2730> in<WG1722> us<WG2254> yearns<WG1971> <WG4314> jealously<WG5355>"?

But<WG1161> he gives<WG1325> more<WG3173> grace.<WG5485> Therefore<WG1352> it says,<WG3004> "God<WG2316> resists<WG498> the proud,<WG5244> but<WG1161> gives<WG1325> grace<WG5485> to the humble.<WG5011>"
Be subject<WG5293> therefore<WG3767> to God.<WG2316> But resist<WG436> the devil,<WG1228> and<WG2532> he will flee<WG5343> from<WG575> you.<WG5216>

Draw near<WG1448> to God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> he will draw near<WG1448> to you.<WG5213> Cleanse<WG2511> your hands,<WG5495> you sinners;<WG268> and<WG2532> purify<WG48> your hearts,<WG2588> you double-minded.<WG1374>

Lament,<WG5003> <WG2532> mourn,<WG3996> and<WG2532> weep.<WG2799> Let<WG3344> your<WG5216> laughter<WG1071> be turned<WG3344> to<WG1519> mourning,<WG3997> and<WG2532> your joy<WG5479> to<WG1519> gloom.<WG2726>
Humble yourselves<WG5013> in the sight of<WG1799> the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> he will exalt<WG5312> <WG5312> you.<WG5209>

Don't<WG3361> speak<WG2635> against<WG2635> one another,<WG240> brothers.<WG80> He who<WG3588> speaks against<WG2635> a brother<WG80> and<WG2532> judges<WG2919> his<WG846> brother,<WG80> speaks against<WG2635> the law<WG3551> and<WG2532> judges<WG2919> the law.<WG3551> But<WG1161> if<WG1487> you judge<WG2919> the law,<WG3551> you are<WG1488> not<WG3756> a doer<WG4163> of the law,<WG3551> but<WG235> a judge.<WG2923>

Only one<WG1520> is<WG2076> the lawgiver,<WG3550> who<WG3588> is<WG2076> able<WG1410> to save<WG4982> and<WG2532> to destroy.<WG622> But who<WG5101> are<WG1488> you<WG4771> to judge<WG2919> another?<WG2087>

Come<WG71> now,<WG3568> you<WG3588> who say,<WG3004> "Today<WG4594> or<WG2532> tomorrow<WG839> let<WG4198>'s go into<WG1519> this<WG3592> city,<WG4172> and<WG2532> spend<WG4160> a<WG1520> year<WG1763> there,<WG1563> trade,<WG1710> and<WG2532> make a<WG1520> profit.<WG2770>"

Whereas<WG3748> you don't<WG3756> know<WG1987> what<WG3588> your life will be like tomorrow.<WG839> For<WG1063> what<WG4169> is your<WG5216> life?<WG2222> For you are<WG2076> a<WG1063> vapor,<WG822> that appears<WG5316> for<WG4314> a little time,<WG3641> and<WG1161> then<WG1899> vanishes away.<WG853>
For<WG473> you<WG5209> ought to say,<WG3004> "If<WG1437> the Lord<WG2962> wills,<WG2532> we will both live,<WG2198> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> this<WG5124> or<WG2228> that.<WG1565>"
But<WG1161> now<WG3568> you glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> boasting.<WG212> All<WG3956> such<WG5108> boasting<WG2746> is<WG2076> evil.<WG4190>
To him therefore<WG3767> who knows<WG1492> to do<WG4160> good,<WG2570> and<WG2532> doesn't<WG3361> do<WG4160> it,<WG846> to him it is<WG2076> sin.<WG266>
